title: Lectern Cover
description: thick red velvet with brown and metallic trim; metallic embroidery on front of 2 floral scrolls and 2 rearing lions flanking a pair of tablets with text; stars with text embroidered on each side; green silk backing
creditline: Gift of Marvin Bloom and gift of Dennis Charles Bergquist, in memory of Isadore Blumenfeld and his brothers Harry and Yiddy
